mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name AS name, u.role AS role, GROUP_CONCAT(p.permission_id) AS permissionListStr FROM user_208201302 u LEFT JOIN permission_208201302 p ON p.user_id = u.id AND p.permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM permission_type_208201302 WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId}) WHERE u.role LIKE CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{role},''), '%') GROUP BY u.id

SELECT u.id, u.name AS name, u.role AS role, GROUP_CONCAT(p.permission_id) AS permissionListStr FROM user_208201302 u LEFT JOIN permission_208201302 p ON p.user_id = u.id AND p.permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM permission_type_208201302 WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId}) WHERE u.id = #{userId} OR u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{empName},''), '%') GROUP BY u.id
select id,type from permission_type_208201302 where resource_id = #{resourceId} and id not in (select permission_id from permission_208201302 group by permission_id);

select uri.uri from permission_type_208201302 type, permission_type_uri_208201302 uri, permission_208201302 p where type.id = uri.type_id and type.id = p.permission_id and p.user_id = #{userId} order by type.id;
